note:
Most-of-the-time linguist, summertime market gardner, player of tabletop RPGs, board, & video games; hiker, cyclist, & lifelong Flames fan. He/him.

avatar alt-text: a mammoth muppet with red fur & an orange trunk. This is meant to be a humourous reference to Elmo Tusk, an infamous idiotic billionaire who will undoubtedly be defeated by John Mastodon.

banner alt-text: one of the Headwall Lakes in the Canadian Rockies - a small dark lake between two mountains.
